hooks.name: validate-conventional-commits
hooks.prompt: Before allowing this git commit, validate that the commit message follows conventional commits format. If it doesn't, suggest the correct format and ask the user to confirm or revise.
hooks.description: Validates commit messages follow conventional commits format before execution

hooks.name: pr-quality-gate
hooks.prompt: Before creating or merging this PR, run quality gates to ensure: 1) All CI checks pass, 2) Tests have adequate coverage, 3) No security issues detected, 4) Code quality scores are acceptable. If any gates fail, warn the user and ask for confirmation before proceeding.
hooks.description: Enforces quality gates before PR creation or merge

hooks.name: issue-triage-reminder
hooks.prompt: After creating this issue, suggest running /issue-triage to properly classify, label, and check for duplicates.
hooks.description: Reminds to triage newly created issues

hooks.name: update-board-on-pr-merge
hooks.description: Automatically updates project board when PR is merged

hooks.name: save-workflow-state
hooks.description: Saves current workflow state for session continuity
